mainPalette.title: Main Palette
mainPalette.text: Simple, yet effective. Classic yet modern. No need to get crazy, just colors that work.

accentPalette.title: Accent Palette
accentPalette.text: The color palette should compliment not compete. So in the essence of being as basic as I can be I introduce the most uncommon colors out there... Yellow, Green, and Blue.

typeface.title: Typeface
typeface.text: Versatile, yet professional. Quiet yet says plenty. My personal favorite typeface is Helvetica, with other Geometric Sans typefaces being comparable but always lacking... something. This typeface has that something. It is the something.
